entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
